arts.ttl: Real Madrid possible starting lineup against Valencia in La Liga
arts.sum: Therefore, the starting eleven Alonso is set to field against Valencia will be: Courtois; Valverde, Militao, Huijsen, Carreras; Tchouameni, Güler; Mastantuono, Bellingham, Vinicius; and Mbappé. The biggest question about Xabi’s lineup for the Valencia match has already been answered by the manager himself: “ Vini won’t face any repercussions.”

arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Pre-Match Press Conference Ahead of Real Madrid vs Valencia in La Liga
arts.sum: "After a very positive week, we have another demanding one coming up, with two La Liga matches, starting against Valencia, and a Champions League visit. Head coach Xabi Alonso is coming off his first statement win at Real, beating Barcelona in the El Clasico.
